column4: also, now for some reason, my USB stick isn't being auto-mounted by 10.10 when I stick it in

I think I'm gonna stick in my backup hard drive and back up everything on /, /boot, /home, /var, and /tmp ... if I do that, I should be able to install windows, repartition, then put everything back on the appropriate partitions, reinstall grub, hen boot again, right?
yep.. although partimage/clonezilla might make it easier

ok, but partitionimage/clonezilla would be duplicating my current partition layout, right? and my current partition layout (while it still works), ahs weird stuff happening...see http://pastebin.com/PJ81Mz9Z
